 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core

Interface Summary
Action This interfaces denotes a procedure that may be executed as part of processing a state transition.
Entity Denotes an entity whose state is managed using the state transition machine.
Guard Denotes a class used to determine whether the conditions for a workflow transition have been met.
StateChangeListener Call-back interface to allow state machine client code to listen for state changes easily.
 

Class Summary
EntityAdapter Provides an adapter that permits ordinary objects to be handled as entities without implementing the Entity interface directly.
Event Denotes an event that may be delivered to a finite state machine.
EventTypeGuard Defines a guard that accepts an event if it is an instance of the type supplied when this guard is created.
NegationGuard Defines a guard that wraps another guard and negates the result of the accept() method call.
PositiveGuard Defines a guard that always accepts the proffered event.
RegexGuard Defines a guard that accepts an event if its object is a string that matches the regular expression supplied with the guard.
State Denotes a state in a finite state machine.
StateMachine Implements a finite state machine.
StateTransitionLatch Implements a latch that waits for a state machine reach a specified state or optionally the error state.
StateTransitionMap Manages the map of states and transitions composing a finite state machine.
StringEvent Denotes an event whose payload is a string.
Transition Defines a transition between two states with an accompanying guard that determines when the transition can be applied.
TransitionMatcher Matches transitions against a particular event.
 

Enum Summary
StateType Enumerates the types of states permitted in a state transition diagram.
 

Exception Summary
FiniteStateException Denotes an exception generated by an error in finite state machine processing, such as a missing transition.
TransitionFailureException Denotes a completely failed transition.
TransitionNotFoundException Denotes an exception due to a missing transition to handle a particular event in a particular state.
TransitionRollbackException Denotes a failed transition that can be rolled back to the previous state.
